Name: Syati Common Functions
Description: Provides access to hook common functions used in the game.

Name: Syati Global Layouts
Description: Provides functionality to have layouts that are always loaded

Name: Syati Initializer Module
Description: Required to make Syati Modules run properly

Name: Syati Object Factories
Description: Provides Object Creation factories that other modules can register to. This allows new objects to be recognized by the game.
Author: [Primary Module]

Name: WaterRiseSwitch
Description: PTD: A Switch that raises the water level to its position.
Author: Bavario

Name: Extermination Counter
Description: That one planet from Space Junk...
Author: Super Hackio

Name: FileSelect Music 2
Description: A module that plays SMG2_title_strm.ast after pressing A + B on FileSelect, similar to SMG1.
Author: Bavario

Name: ScenarioSelect Music 2
Description: A module that plays SMG2_galaxy08_strm.ast after selecting a star on ScenarioSelect, instead of the standard Intro Music.
Author: Bavario

Name: SMG2 OpenGhost
Description: Cosmic Races in SMG2
Author: Super Hackio

Name: SMG2 FPS Layout
Description: An FPS Counter for Super Mario Galaxy
Author: Super Hackio

Name: SMG2 WPad Input Display Layout
Description: A Layout that shows what inputs are being recieved by the game.
Author: Super Hackio, SY24

Name: Dive Move
Description: Adds the Dive from Super Mario 64. Simply press A while mid-air to perform it.
Author: Bavario, VTXG

Name: Ground Pound Jump
Description: Adds the Ground Pound Jump move from Super Mario Odyssey. Simply Ground Pound and Jump after landing.
Author: Bavario, Evanbowl

Name: 360° Camera
Description: Provides a 360° Camera like in Super Mario Odyssey. You can hold D-Pad Left or Right to circle it around, or D-Pad Up and Down to change the FoV.
Author: Bavario

Name: SMG2 SwingRope Patch
Description: This is the swinging vine from Beach Bowl Galaxy. This actor was left unused in SMG2's code, though. Its constructor is lost, but it can be easily restored. Other than that, all of its functionality is fully intact.
Author: Aurum

Name: GCaptureBreakArea
Description: PTD: Breaks the current GCapture bubble when entered.
Author: Bavario

Name: WaterLeakPipe
Description: PTD: The leaking water pipe from Freezeflame Galaxy and Deep Dark Galaxy.
Author: Aurum

Name: Kingfin in SMG2
Description: Kingfin makes his grand return...
Author: Super Hackio

Name: NumberedSwitchArea
Description: PTD: NumberedSwitchArea
Author: Gabbo

Name: BenefitItemMoon
Description: PTD: 3-Up Moon from SMW
Author: EterSky

Name: MorphSwitchCtrl
Description: PTD: Controller that checks for morph-related stuff
Author: EterSky

Name: MultipleChoiceDice
Description: A throwable dice cube with four red circles and two blue crosses on its sides. It activates a different switch depending on the side that it lands on.
Author: Aurum

Name: ScrewSwitchBase
Description: PTD: The screwable screws from Toy Time Galaxy
Author: Aurum

Name: Metal Mario
Description: Adds Metal Mario from SM64 through the Metal Mushroom to SMG2.
Author: Bavario

Name: Mecha Bowser Mapparts in SMG2
Description: Fresh from the Assembly Line
Author: Super Hackio

Name: Topmaniac in SMG2
Description: He's here for his revenge...
Author: Super Hackio

Name: Red Star and Ice Flower
Description: PT: Red Star and Ice Flower
Author: Aurum

Name: Banekiti
Description: The yellow spring dudes from Boo's Boneyard
Author: Aurum

Name: GoldenTurtle
Description: Gold Koopa Shell
Author: Aurum

Name: Spooky Speedster in SMG2
Description: Ehehehe... so you're after it too?
Author: Super Hackio

Name: Dead Leaves
Description: A pile of autumn leaves from Gold Leaf Galaxy.
Author: Aurum

Name: Tamakoro2
Description: Adds various features to the Star Ball to allow for more unique uses of the object.
Author: Evanbowl, AwesomeTMC

Name: HitWallTimerSwitch
Description: PTD: One of the many unused switch controllers from SMG1 that is activated by attacking the purple button
Author: Aurum

Name: PlayerSwitchCtrl
Description: PTD: A controller switch that de/activates when the player has selected the specified character
Author: Evanbowl, Aurum

Name: PTimerSwitch
Description: PTD: A switch that can be jumped on.
Author: Evanbowl

Name: SensorDetector
Description: PTD: An object that detects if the specified message is in the sensor's range
Author: Someone, Evanbowl

Name: SMG1: Unused Bowser Land Mines
Description: Adds back the Bowser Land Mines that were unused in SMG1
Author: Someone, Aurum

Name: SMG1: Unused Pull Star UFO
Description: Adds the unused Pull Star UFO that was unused in SMG1's Game Files
Author: BlueXD

Name: FirePressureRadiate
Description: Adds the "FirePressureRadiate" actor from SMG1.
Author: Aurum

Name: Cycle Controller
Description: A controller for a repeatable cycle.
Author: BjornGmr

Name: Toxic Area
Description:
PTD: The Toxic Gas from SM64 makes its way into SMG2!
 - Obj_Arg0: The time (in frames) it takes for the player to die inside this area.
 - Obj_Arg1: Coin restore amount, from 0 to 100.
 - Obj_Arg2: Bubble restore amount, from 0 to 100.

 - SW_A: Enable/disable area.
Author: VTXG, Bavario

Name: SMG2 MagicBell Port
Description: The star pointer bell from SMG1
Author: Super Hackio

Name: SMG2 NoteCounter Restored
Description: The Note Counter from E3 SMG1
Author: Super Hackio

Name: SimpleNPC
Description: A Simple way to add new NPCs to the game
Author: Super Hackio

Name: Position Warp Controller
Description:
A very basic object that when placed, allows you to store the player's position by pressing 1.
Then you can warp to that stored position by pressing 2.

Shoutouts to PKSMG2 for the idea!
Author: Bavario

Name: SupportTico Areas
Description:
Provides two areas to interact with the Co-Star Luma.
SupportTicoSwitchArea: Turns on its SW_A when the player enters the area with 2-Player mode active. The SW_A will turn off either when when the player leaves the area or when 2-Player mode gets disabled.
NoSupportTicoArea: Fully disables the second controller (and therefore the Co-Star Luma) as long as the player is inside the area.
Author: Bavario

Name: ButtonSwitchArea
Description: An area that can activate its SW_A based on the controller inputs.
Author: Bavario

Name: Extended Stationed File List
Description: Extends the list of files that are always loaded in memory.
Author: Evanbowl

Name: Troll Area
Description:
Meant as a silly joke. Entering this area will perform one of the following actions:

- Obj_arg0 = -1: Crashes the game.
- Obj_arg0 = 0: Shuts down the console.
- Obj_arg0 = 1: Exits to the Home Menu.
- Obj_arg0 = 2: Very strongly rumbles the Wiimote.
- Obj_arg0 = 3: Play a random sound effect every frame.
Author: Bavario

Name: Matter Splatter Color Controller
Description:
A Controller that lets you change the color of some Matter Splatter objects when its SW_A is activated.
When the switch is turned off, the color returns to normal.
- Obj_arg0: Red (0 to 255), Default 0.
- Obj_arg1: Blue (0 to 255), Default 0.
- Obj_arg2: Green (0 to 255), Default 0.
- Obj_arg3: Alpha (0 to 255), Default 255.
Author: Gabbo

Name: Matter Splatter Lantern
Description:
A custom lantern that evokes a spherical matter splatter when it is selected with the player's cursor, and disappears after a chosen amount of time.
A matter splatter setup is needed to make it work.
- Obj_arg0: The size of the sphere, Default 750.
- Obj_arg1: The time in frames it takes for the sphere to grow until it reaches its specified size in Obj_arg0, Default 30.
- Obj_arg2: The time in frames it stays at full size before it shrinks down, Default 180.
- Obj_arg3: the time in frames it takes for the sphere to shrink down to 0, Default 120.
Author: Gabbo

Name: Death Counter
Description: Makes it so the life counter layout displays the Player's death count.
Author: VTXG

Name: OSWReport
Description: Adds a version of OSReport that writes to a log file.
Author: AwesomeTMC

Name: Wrapping Area
Description: An area with a Wrap-Around effect that teleports the player to the other side of the area when he leaves it.
Author: Aba gamer, Bavario

Name: TeresaAtomicPatch
Description: Unhardcodes the amount of child Boos a TeresaAtomic can have.
Author: Bavario

Name: DolphinSwitchArea
Description: A custom area that enables its SW_A when Mario enters it and if the game is played on Dolphin emulator.
Author: Bavario

Name: MarioStateSwitchArea
Description: A custom area that enables its SW_A when Mario enters it and is in the given state.
Author: Bavario

Name: Mushroom Bounce Pads
Description: The Mushroom Bounce Pads from Super Mario 3D World. Can also be used to make your own bounce pads (which do not need to be mushrooms)
Author: Super Hackio (Original), Bavario (Decompiled after original was lost)

Name: Switchboard
Description: The 2-way Switchboard from 3D Land/3D World that moves on a rail.
Author: Bavario

Name: Custom Arrow Platform
Description: The arrow platform from Hazy Maze Cave in Super Mario 64. It can be customized to have any amount of arrows facing any direction. The models were made by Alex SMG.
Author: Bavario

Name: JumpStandAutoNeo
Description: Overhauls the vanilla JumpStandAuto object, adding support for many things such as custom launch heights, colors, switch and rail support.
Author: Bavario

Name: Warp Box
Description: The Warp Box from 3D World/Land and Mario Maker 2.
Author: Bavario

Name: Blue Coin System
Description: PTD: Full Blue Coin System
Author: Evanbowl, Lord-Giganticus

Name: Custom Coin Spawns
Description:
Custom Coin Spawns

Currently Supported (Blue Coin)
Kuribo (Obj_arg2)
SamboHead (Obj_arg1)
Teresa (Obj_arg6 and Obj_arg7)

Currently Supported (Red Coin)
Kuribo (Obj_arg3)
SamboHead (Obj_arg2)
Teresa (Obj_arg7)
Author: Evanbowl

Name: SMG2 OnimasuPivot
Description: The alternative Tox Box variant used in Toy Time Galaxy.
Author: Super Hackio, HeadPenguin

Name: Donut Blocks
Description:
Brings the Donut Blocks from Super Mario 3D Land/World into SMG2.
Read the README for instructions on how to set up this module properly.
Author: VTXG, Humming Owl

Name: SuperFlag
Description: An API for user defined conditionals (read the README for more info).
Author: AwesomeTMC, Evanbowl

Name: InArcHotswap
Description: Allows you to swap certain files within .arc archives (read the README for more info).
Author: AwesomeTMC

Name: SMG2_SimpleMirrorObj
Description: Ports the removed SimpleMirrorObj back into SMG2 as a ProductMapObjDataTable class, allowing the game to render Mirror Actors with MirrorArea.
Author: Super Hackio

Name: Galaxy Toolkit
Description:
An external tool for SMG2 modding that hooks into Dolphin Emulator and provides ways of interacting with it.
https://github.com/Lord-G-INC/GalaxyToolkit
Author: VTXG

Name: ObjectPullArea
Description: An area that when entered, allows objects to be pulled towards the player.
Author: Bavario, AwesomeTMC

Name: ExtPostFogArea
Description: New functionality for PostFogArea
Author: Gabbo

Name: ForbidWaterSearchArea
Description: Enables ForbidWaterSearchArea to be used.
Author: Bavario

Name: AnmModelSwitchMultiMove
Description: A new ProductMapObj class that has multiple animations based on the switch that is active.
Author: Bavario
